### UBS *GNT* encoding rules

As a general rule, attestations representing three-quarters or more of a class of witnesses are taken to be the class reading.

X vs X-mss (e.g. Irenaeus<sup>lat</sup> vs Irenaeus<sup>lat</sup><sup>mss</sup>)
: Record NA

X-ms vs X-mss
: Record mss reading

X-ms vs X-ms
: Record NA

X-mss vs X-mss
: Record NA

X-a/d vs X-b/d
: Record reading if largest ratio &ge; 3/4 (0.75) else record NA
